description: An adapter allowing one to install a popular Trijicon RMR red dot sight onto a common Picatinny rail.  This being a low mount, it allows the user to reduce the amount of space their gun takes, in exchange for slightly more effort while aiming.

name.str: Trijicon RM35 RMR mount for ACOG

description: A specialized mount allowing one to install a popular Trijicon RMR red dot sight on top of an equally-popular Trijicon ACOG TA01 sight.  This enables usage of different sights for different distances, potentially making aiming quicker and more precise overall.

notes: width is 1.125× width of RM33, to account for the boss legs
height is 2× the height of RM33, to account for the boss legs
assumes Amazon dimensions are packaging, as they often are for firearm accessories

description: A set of two rings on top of a single large platform, accomodating a single 30mm scope.

//notes: this mount is postponed until an advantage has been found to its use over RM33 or similar mounts

unfortunately, such is currently unimplementable without also giving the gun free accuracy
description: A lightweight mount for a popular Trijicon RMR red dot sight.  Raises the sight point significantly.  The skeletal construction of the mount allows it to save a lot of weight.
